sentence: Book months in advance for the best rates
Staff is well trained and very helpful rooms are clean and elegantDid not realize that parking was so pricey but all of San Francisco is pricey
Great hotel close to Fishermans Wharf but pricey
Its location and overall appearance and the on site restaurant is very nice and reasonably priced considering its location
Reasonably priced rooms parking structure across the street for 35 overnight parking
Nice hotel great staff and location but a little expensive
My husband and I were searching online for a reasonably priced hotel in the city and discovered Hotel Zoe
We ate in the hotel restaurant every morning for breakfast much much better than the usual chain hotel fare and reasonably priced
Price was reasonable for the area and right across the street from a grocery and pharmacy
I thought the price was comparable to all the other hotels in the area and the service was outstanding
However facility fees had to be paid which I was not aware of and with no notice the hallways outside my room started to be decorated
It cost a furtune to stay
I would have expected better towels and toiletries for the price of 400 per nightrom was 39 plus 84 in taxes and fees
I explained to the manager that they could not lower their prices online so customers would sign up to then slap them with extra fees
Car hire through hotel expensive compared to a quarter of the price from the airport
I got a great deal so i think we payed the right amount for the days we stayed there
Not sure why they charge a resort fee
They also offer a rebate of 5 day should you choose to decline housekeeping during your stay this can be used towards the bar restaurant or any other room charges
The hotel charges a fee for water in the lobby and internet of 30 dollars and the cost to park a car is 60 dollars
It seemed expensive but typical of San Fran
